job_details.Functieomschrijving: ?  * Social media & AI verbinden - Je gebruikt social API's (Meta, TikTok, Twitter/X, YouTube, Reddit, LinkedIn) om data te verzamelen, analyseren en slim te gebruiken in AI-modellen.  * AI-gestuurde content & insights genereren - Je ontwikkelt systemen die automatisch captions, visuals en video's creëren op basis van trending topics en merkdata.
job_details.full_text:
Generative AI Engineer

?  * Social media & AI verbinden - Je gebruikt social API's (Meta, TikTok, Twitter/X, YouTube, Reddit, LinkedIn) om data te verzamelen, analyseren en slim te gebruiken in AI-modellen.  * AI-gestuurde content & insights genereren - Je ontwikkelt systemen die automatisch captions, visuals en video's creëren op basis van trending topics en merkdata.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes building systems that generate content (captions, visuals, videos) using AI, directly aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer. The use of social media APIs for data collection and analysis to feed into AI models further supports this classification.

job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the application of data and insights into AI models, which is a core aspect of model development and adaptation.
This directly refers to the creation and generation of content using AI, a primary function of generative AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: Je ontwikkelt systemen die automatisch captions, visuals en video's creëren
job_tasks.justification: This describes the development of systems and applications to deliver AI-generated content, which falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Je gebruikt social API's (Meta, TikTok, Twitter/X, YouTube, Reddit, LinkedIn) om data te verzamelen, analyseren
job_tasks.justification: This involves collecting and analyzing data from external sources using APIs, which is a data engineering task.

technologies.phrase: social API's (Meta, TikTok, Twitter/X, YouTube, Reddit, LinkedIn)

soft_skills.phrase: Je ontwikkelt systemen die automatisch captions, visuals en video's creëren
